item.title: Version 0.9.5
item.description:
What's New in 0.9.5

  • Fixed: Auto-create year folder hierarchy (GM_YYYY) on first day of year
  • Fixed: Docket search now works across all years, not just current year
  • Fixed: Search cache properly invalidates when folders are created
  • Removed: 2026_SFX SESSIONS BACK UPS from preset folder hierarchy

item.title: Version 0.9.4
item.description: Cache Sync Fix - Bundle sync_shared_cache.sh with app for automatic availability - Fixes setup error on devices without project directory - Script now included in app bundle Resources folder

item.title: Version 0.9.3
item.description: Simian Integration Improvements - Project Manager selection now uses pre-configured list from Settings - Fixed project manager assignment when creating Simian projects - Resolved SwiftUI state modification warnings - Improved reliability of Simian project creation

item.title: Version 0.9.2
item.description: Email filtering improvements: - New docket emails now only from Grayson Producers: Added signature validation to ensure only emails from Grayson employees (@graysonmusicgroup.com) with 'Producer' title in their signature are processed as new docket emails - Improved signature extraction: Better handling of HTML emails and email signature detection - Fixed notification center UI: Rounded corners background now properly displays without sharp corners showing through

item.title: Version 0.9.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.9.1

  • Fixed CodeMind quota exceeded handling: Prevents excessive API calls when rate limits are hit
  • Improved file delivery detection: Replies in new docket threads with file links are now properly detected as file deliveries
  • Enhanced CodeMind classification: File delivery links are checked through CodeMind to distinguish incoming vs outgoing (prevents false positives for outgoing client links)
  • Improved JSON repair: Better handling of truncated API responses with multiple repair attempts
  • Bug fixes: Fixed quota exceeded status preventing further API calls during the same scan cycle

item.title: Version 0.9.0
item.description: Fixed window resizing: Windows are now properly locked to their default sizes in both compact and dashboard modes. Fullscreen mode: Entering fullscreen automatically switches to dashboard mode for optimal viewing. Mode switching: Added compact mode button in dashboard view to easily switch back to compact mode. Automatic window resizing: Window automatically resizes to appropriate size when switching between compact and dashboard modes. UI improvements: Fixed sidebar background to extend fully to top of window, restored all traffic light buttons. Cleanup: Removed Ready. status text from bottom right corner. Window management: Improved window delegate handling to prevent unwanted resizing.

item.title: Version 0.8.0
item.description: CodeMind Brain Data Provider: Advanced data aggregation and intelligence layer. CodeMind Context Engine: Enhanced context processing and analysis. CodeMind Data Fusion: Multi-source data integration capabilities. CodeMind File Intelligence: Sophisticated file analysis and insights. CodeMind Metadata Intelligence: Enhanced metadata processing and extraction. CodeMind Session Analyzer: Deep session insights and pattern recognition. Email Feedback Tracker: Comprehensive email feedback management system. Enhanced CodeMind Email Classifier: Improved classification accuracy and performance. Enhanced Email Scanning Service: Better scanning capabilities and reliability. Improved CodeMind Brain View: Expanded functionality and user experience. Enhanced notification system: Better UI components and interaction. Improved CodeMind Logger: Enhanced logging infrastructure. Rule Editor View: New interface for managing classification rules. Grayson Employee Whitelist: Employee filtering functionality. Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 0.7.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.7.1

  • Fixed search results disappearing after pressing Enter
  • Excluded newlines from key handlers to prevent exact match filtering from breaking

item.title: Version 0.7.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.7.0

  • CodeMind Brain Visualization: Interactive mind map editor for viewing and editing classification rules
  • CodeMind Rules Manager: Create custom classification rules with pattern matching (subject, sender, body, docket format)
  • CodeMind Classification History: Track and learn from past classification decisions
  • CodeMind Activity Monitor: Real-time monitoring of classification activity and anomaly detection
  • Enhanced notification system with context menu actions (View in MindMap, Create Rule, Re-classify)
  • Fixed compact UI layout to restore original design and spacing
  • Improved CodeMind integration with email classification
  • Better notification context menu with classification feedback options
  • CodeMind service registry for centralized service management
  • Pattern suggester for intelligent rule creation from email patterns

item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.6.0

  • Added comprehensive logging infrastructure with file-based logging and debug helpers
  • New splash screen with progress tracking and initialization feedback
  • Enhanced email qualification system with detailed debug output and improved filtering
  • Improved file hosting link detection (excludes images, social media, review platforms)
  • New grabbed indicator service to track when media team members reply to emails
  • Redesigned login UI with profile selection
  • Performance optimizations: company name cache preloading, background initialization
  • Better session management with settings sync and conflict detection

item.title: Version 0.5.1
item.description: Fixed Gmail OAuth credentials and duplicate method definitions - Restored GmailService, GmailModels, and SimianService files - Added Gmail OAuth authentication methods to OAuthService - Fixed duplicate method definitions causing compilation errors - Fixed 'OAuth credentials not configured' error - Properly signed with available certificate

item.title: Version 0.5.0
item.description: Gmail/Simian integration and notification system - Added Gmail integration for email scanning - Added Simian service integration - New notification system with popup windows - Auto docket creation from emails - Enhanced OAuth configuration - Improved notification center UI

item.title: Version 0.4.0
item.description: Pre-release: Major refactoring and new features - Refactored ContentView into smaller focused components (SidebarView, StagingAreaView, ActionButtonsView) - Added new UI components: NewDocketView, PrepSummaryView, NoSelectTextField - Improved code organization and maintainability - Fixed dev builds to always use dev update channel - Added directory connection checking methods - Restored all missing components from previous refactor
